mapper.select: SELECT ID.level, DATA.* FROM (SELECT @ids AS _ids, (SELECT @ids := GROUP_CONCAT(id) FROM park WHERE FIND_IN_SET(parent_id, @ids)) AS cids, @l := @l + 1 AS LEVEL FROM park, (SELECT @ids := (select id from park where code = #{code}), @l := 0) b WHERE @ids IS NOT NULL) id, park DATA WHERE FIND_IN_SET(DATA.id, ID._ids) ORDER BY LEVEL, id ;
